name: DegenVC
description: "Degens replace VCs - Curation Market for Uniswap. In a Nutshell: Assuming teams lock their tokens in a pragmatic way, an airdrop to Uniswap liquidity providers is a viable funding strategy for a crypto project. DGVC token liquidity providers on Uniswap receive these airdrops in proportion to their LP token holding. When we get big enough degens replace VCs."
